attributes.action: Save our oceans from plastic and over fishing
attributes.additional_details:
Up to 80% of our oxygen comes from our oceans and it has already been proven that oxygen levels our dropping not to mention all the plastic that is suffocating the oceans as it is 
If the government really cares about you or your future and your children's future why is nothing being done
Think of all the trillions spent globally fighting this so called pandemic and how fast these great minds came up with a vaccines in no time we ask for the same if not more to be put in to saving our oceans
attributes.background:
I want the government to start taking action to save our oceans from plastic and over fishing 
Our oceans are at a critical point and once it goes past this then I'm afraid it will be to late then our oceans will not recover and we will all be condemned to the same fate

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
